title: BBC begins crackdown of iPlayer viewers using a VPN
text:
BBC begins crackdown of iPlayer viewers using a VPN 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
BBC is blocking VPN users trying to access iPlayer through a VPN, in a new move to make sure only U.K. residents are able to view the conten... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
